text: John Nelson Brander (born 15 June 1884) was a Scottish footballer who played for Dumbarton, Vale of Leven, Rangers and Clydebank. ==References== Category:1884 births Category:Scottish footballers Category:Dumbarton F.C. players Category:Vale of Leven F.C. players Category:Rangers F.C. players Category:Clydebank F.C. (1914) players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:Year of death missing Category:Association football forwards
title: John Brander
